attributes.action: KONY2012 - Invisible Children. We DEMAND ACTION for the arrest of Joseph Kony in Central Africa!
attributes.additional_details:
If just one child was abducted to become a child soldier or sex slave in Britain, there would be public outcry. Yet for nearly 30 YEARS Joseph Kony has been responsible for abducting, raping and mutilating 30,000 children.

We want to see PUBLIC GOVERNMENT INVOLVEMENT in the pursuit and arrest of the most wanted criminal on earth. It is time that he be brought to justice.

We want to see him brought to justice by the end of 2012.
